Package edu.ma02.core.interfaces

Interface ICity

public interface ICity

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG)
Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI)
Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP)
2020 / 2021

Contract representing a City behaviour

  • Method Details

    • getId

      String getId()
      Getter for id that identifies each City
      Returns:
      The id of the City

    • getName

      String getName()
      Getter for name
      Returns:
      The name of the city

    • addStation

      boolean addStation​(String name) throws CityException
      Adds a new station to the city
      Parameters:
      name - station name that represents the name of the zone in which sensors are installed
      Returns:
      1. true if the station was inserted in the collection storing all stations
      2. false if the station already exists
      Throws:
      CityException - if the @param name is null

    • addSensor

      boolean addSensor​(String stationName, String sensorId, ICartesianCoordinates cartesianCoordinates, IGeographicCoordinates geographicCoordenates) throws CityException, StationException, SensorException
      Adds a new sensor to a station
      Parameters:
      sensorId - sensor id
      cartesianCoordinates - cartesian coordinates in which the sensor is installed
      geographicCoordenates - geographic coordinates in which the sensor is installed
      stationName - station name (used to identify the station) in which the sensor will be added
      Returns:
      1. true if the sensor was inserted in the collection storing all sensors
      2. false if the sensor already exists
      Throws:
      CityException - if the station doesn't exists or if param stationName parameter is null
      StationException - uncatched from station if the sensor doesn't exists or the sensorId is invalid (i.e. less or more than 10 characters)
      SensorException - uncatched from sensor if the sensorId is invalid (i.e. less or more than 10 characters)

    • addMeasurement

      boolean addMeasurement​(String stationName, String sensorId, double value, String unit, LocalDateTime date) throws CityException, StationException, SensorException, MeasurementException
      Adds a new measurement to a sensor from a station
      Parameters:
      stationName - station name used to identify the station
      sensorId - sensor id in which the measurement will be associated
      value - measurement value
      unit - measurement unit for which the value was recorded
      date - measurement date for which the value was recorded
      Returns:
      1. true if the measurement was inserted in the collection storing all sensors
      2. false if the measurement already exists
      Throws:
      CityException - if the station doesn't exists or if @param stationName parameter is null
      StationException - uncatched from station if the sensor doesn't exists
      SensorException - uncatched from sensor if the unit is not compatible with the unit pre-defined for the sensor
      MeasurementException - uncatched from measurement if the value is -99 or any parameter is invalid

    • getStations

      IStation[] getStations()
      Return a copy of the existing stations
      Returns:
      a copy of the existing stations

    • getStation

      IStation getStation​(String name)
      Return a copy of a existing station from a @param id
      Parameters:
      name - station name
      Returns:
      a copy of a existing station from a id

    • getSensorsByStation

      ISensor[] getSensorsByStation​(String stationName)
      Return a copy of the existing sensors from a station
      Parameters:
      stationName - identifying the station
      Returns:
      a copy of the existing sensors

    • getMeasurementsBySensor

      IMeasurement[] getMeasurementsBySensor​(String sensorId)
      Return a copy of the existing measurements from a sensor
      Parameters:
      sensorId - identifying the sensor
      Returns:
      a copy of the existing measurements
